account.login.azure: You have successfully logged into Azure.
account.login.m365: You have successfully logged into Microsoft 365.
account.show.azure: Your Azure account is: %s. Your subscriptions are: %s
error.MissingRequiredOptionError: The command '%s' can not be executed for missing required option '%s'. Provide the option via '%s' and try again.
error.MissingRequiredArgumentError: The command '%s' can not be executed for missing required argument '%s'. Provide the argument and try again.
error.ArgumentConflictError: The command '%s' is designed to accept either argument '%s' or argument '%s', but not both simultaneously. Keep either of the two arguments and try again.
error.UnknownOptionError: The command '%s' can not be executed for unknown option '%s'.
error.UnknownArgumentError: The command '%s' can not be executed for unknown argument '%s'.
error.InvalidOptionErrorReason: '%s' is not in the valid option list: %s.
error.InvalidChoiceError: The command '%s' can not be executed for invalid choice '%s' for option/argument '%s', allowed values: %s.

provision.description: Run the provision stage in teamsapp.yml or teamsapp.local.yml.

deploy.description: Run the deploy stage in teamsapp.yml or teamsapp.local.yml.

publish.description: Run the publish stage in teamsapp.yml.

upgrade.description: Upgrade the project to work with the latest version of Teams Toolkit.

options.force: Force upgrade the project to work with the latest version of Teams Toolkit.

account.SideLoadingDisabled: Your Microsoft 365 tenant admin hasn't enabled custom app upload permission for your account. You can't install your app to Teams!
account.NotSignIn: You have not logged in to your Microsoft 365 account yet. Please use teamsapp auth login command to login to your Microsoft 365 account.
account.SignInSuccess: Microsoft 365 Account (%s) is logged in and custom app upload permission is enabled.

node.NotFound: Cannot find Node.js. Node.js used for developing Teams apps with JavaScript or TypeScript using Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code. Visit https://nodejs.org/about/releases/ to install the LTS version.
node.NotSupported: Node.js (%s) is not the officially supported version (%s). Your project may continue to work but we recommend to install the supported version.

dotnet.NotFound: Cannot find .NET Core SDK. .NET Core SDK is used for developing Teams app in C# using Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. Visit https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download to install the LTS version.
dotnet.NotSupported: .NET Core SDK (%s) is not the officially supported version (%s).

func.NotFound: Cannot find Azure Functions Core Tools.
func.NotSupported: Azure Functions Core Tools (%s) is not the officially supported version (%s).
func.Success: Azure Functions Core Tools version (%s) is installed.

cert.FoundNotTrust: Local Certificate is found but not trusted.
cert.Success: Local Certificate is found and is trusted.
